AND MI.SJ LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'

select.if:
SELECT MI.*,st_astext(st_transform(geom, 'EPSG:5179')) as wkt, TO_CHAR(MI.FRST_REGIST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT, TO_CHAR(MI.LAST_MODF_DT , 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MODF_DT, CEI.USER_NM,
(SELECT MEMO_ID FROM TBD_USRT_MEMO_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND LAST_MODF_DT IN ( SELECT MIN(LAST_MODF_DT) FROM TBD_USRT_MEMO_INFO A WHERE 1=1 AND A.EMPLYR_ID =#{emplyrId} AND A.LAST_MODF_DT > #{lastModfDt}::TIMESTAMP
AND A.SJ LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
AND CEI.USER_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
)) AS PREV_MEMO_ID,
(SELECT SJ FROM TBD_USRT_MEMO_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND LAST_MODF_DT IN ( SELECT MIN(LAST_MODF_DT) FROM TBD_USRT_MEMO_INFO A WHERE 1=1 AND A.EMPLYR_ID =#{emplyrId} AND A.LAST_MODF_DT > #{lastModfDt}::TIMESTAMP
AND A.SJ LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
AND CEI.USER_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
)) AS PREV_SJ,
(SELECT MEMO_ID FROM TBD_USRT_MEMO_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND LAST_MODF_DT IN ( SELECT MAX(LAST_MODF_DT) FROM TBD_USRT_MEMO_INFO A WHERE 1=1 AND A.EMPLYR_ID =#{emplyrId} AND A.LAST_MODF_DT < #{lastModfDt}::TIMESTAMP
AND A.SJ LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
AND CEI.USER_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
)) AS NEXT_MEMO_ID,
(SELECT SJ FROM TBD_USRT_MEMO_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND LAST_MODF_DT IN ( SELECT MAX(LAST_MODF_DT) FROM TBD_USRT_MEMO_INFO A WHERE 1=1 AND A.EMPLYR_ID =#{emplyrId} AND A.LAST_MODF_DT < #{lastModfDt}::TIMESTAMP
AND A.SJ LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
AND CEI.USER_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
)) AS NEXT_SJ FROM TBD_USRT_MEMO_INFO MI LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO CEI ON MI.EMPLYR_ID = CEI.EMPLYR_ID WHERE MI.MEMO_ID = #{memoId}

mapper.insert:
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(CAST(MEMO_ID AS INTEGER)), 0) + 1 FROM TBD_USRT_MEMO_INFO;
INSERT INTO TBD_USRT_MEMO_INFO ( MEMO_ID, EMPLYR_ID, SJ, PNRS_AT, LNM_ADRES, MEMO_CN, FRST_REGIST_DT, LAST_MODF_DT, geom ) VALUES ( #{memoId}, #{emplyrId}, #{sj}, #{pnrsAt}, #{lnmAdres}, #{memoCn}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, ST_SETSRID(ST_GEOMFROMTEXT(#{wkt}), 5179) )
mapper.update: UPDATE TBD_USRT_MEMO_INFO SET SJ = #{sj}, LAST_MODF_DT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PNRS_AT = #{pnrsAt}, MEMO_CN = #{memoCn}, geom = ST_SETSRID(ST_GEOMFROMTEXT(#{wkt}), 5179) WHERE MEMO_ID = #{memoId}
